20110131232347.000|20110131232350.000|TR0|JEFFREY TOOBIN, CNN SENIOR LEGAL ANALYST:  
20110131232350.000|20110131232353.000|TR0|And, Wolf, what makes this decision even

20110131234826.000|20110131234828.000|TR0|

20110131234831.000|20110131234833.000|TR0|different hotel, because we were staying 
20110131234833.000|20110131234836.000|TR0|at Safir, I believe, Hotel about two 
20110131234836.000|20110131234839.000|TR0|blocks from the museum.  So we lucked out. 
20110131234839.000|20110131234841.000|TR0| We weren't in the middle of it, but we 
20110131234841.000|20110131234844.000|TR0|stayed at the Radisson Blue instead.  And 
20110131234844.000|20110131234846.000|TR0|there were some locals out there that were 
20110131234846.000|20110131234849.000|TR0|standing guard with, you know, large 
20110131234849.000|20110131234852.000|TR0|sticks, metal rods, bats, blockading the 
20110131234852.000|20110131234854.000|TR0|streets.  Just, we -- you know, they were 
20110131234854.000|20110131234857.000|TR0|taking precautions, thinking they might do 
20110131234857.000|20110131234859.000|TR0|damage.  So they kept everyone in hotel 
20110131234859.000|20110131234902.000|TR0|rooms, telling us not to leave.  But it 
20110131234902.000|20110131234905.000|TR0|appeared they were just protecting their 
20110131234905.000|20110131234907.000|TR0|property from anyone who might be looting.
20110131234907.000|20110131234910.000|TR0|

20110131234912.000|20110131234915.000|TR0|back.  I'm sure your families are a lot

20110131235425.000|20110131235427.000|TR0|friend of ours, Jerry Thompson, died over

20110131235430.000|20110131235433.000|TR0|cancer.  He worked here at CNN for more 
20110131235433.000|20110131235435.000|TR0|than 25 years, covering some of our most
